original_solution_mapping.L1: Earl was on the 1 + 5 = <<1+5=6>>6th floor after going up 5 floors.
original_solution_mapping.L2: When he went down 2 floors, he was on the 6 - 2 = <<6-2=4>>4th floor.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Since he went up 7 floors, he was then on the 4 + 7 = <<4+7=11>>11th floor.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Since he is 9 floors away from the top of the building, therefore the building has 11 + 9 = <<11+9=20>>20 floors.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 471.
    Returns: the total number of floors in the building.
    """
    # L1
    start_floor = 1 # first floor
    up_5_floors = 5 # went up 5 floors
    current_floor_after_up_5 = start_floor + up_5_floors

    # L2
    down_2_floors = 2 # went down 2 floors
    current_floor_after_down_2 = current_floor_after_up_5 - down_2_floors

    # L3
    up_7_floors = 7 # went up 7 floors
    current_floor_after_up_7 = current_floor_after_down_2 + up_7_floors

    # L4
    floors_away_from_top = 9 # 9 floors away from the top of the building
    total_floors = current_floor_after_up_7 + floors_away_from_top

    # FA
    answer = total_floors
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Earl was on the {start_floor} + {up_5_floors} = <<{start_floor}+{up_5_floors}={current_floor_after_up_5}>>{current_floor_after_up_5}th floor after going up {up_5_floors} floors.

When he went down {down_2_floors} floors, he was on the {current_floor_after_up_5} - {down_2_floors} = <<{current_floor_after_up_5}-{down_2_floors}={current_floor_after_down_2}>>{current_floor_after_down_2}th floor.

Since he went up {up_7_floors} floors, he was then on the {current_floor_after_down_2} + {up_7_floors} = <<{current_floor_after_down_2}+{up_7_floors}={current_floor_after_up_7}>>{current_floor_after_up_7}th floor.

Since he is {floors_away_from_top} floors away from the top of the building, therefore the building has {current_floor_after_up_7} + {floors_away_from_top} = <<{current_floor_after_up_7}+{floors_away_from_top}={total_floors}>>{total_floors} floors.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: When he went down 2 floors, he was on the 6 - 2 = <<6-2=4>>4th floor.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'start_floor' (1) was used instead of 'floors_away_from_top' (9).
